title: Which foundry released font "Hamburg"?
content:
Hi,  
where can I buy the font “Hamburg”. Internet search didn’t help.

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Looking for a cool "lightning" font - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420111419/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14312 "Go to previous forum topic") [need an id for this 70's typeface. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080420111419/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14319 "Go to next forum topic")
author: velour

comments.content: Velour, do you have any sort of image or sample?

I think it was originally from B&P Graphics, you’ll find HamburgSerial on Softmaker’s MegaFont Collection.

-Stefan
Is it just me, or is Hamburg an ugly data-pointless cousin of Franklin Gothic?

Tiff, you have a caustic twin sister? ;-)  
Tell her I might just agree. What exactly is “data-pointless” though?!

hhp
data-poinless is a typeface with pointless data ergo a pointless typeface. :^!
